description: Critical Fumble is a skill to generate Critical Fumble Effects for Tabletop RPG Games with a focus on the D20 Ruleset. You can get a Critical Fumble Effect by saying "Alexa, Critical Fumble" or by saying "Alexa tell Critical Fumble to roll me a fumble".
exampleInteractions: Alexa, ask Critical Fumble to roll me a fumble
tell Critical Fumble to give me a critical failure
ask Critical Fumble for a failure
name: Critical Fumble
shortDescription: Critical Fumble is a skill to generate Critical Fumble Effects for Tabletop RPG Games.
